alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 16 at 6:15PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by Heavy Rainfall is possible WHERE...All islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Tuesday morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cuase flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Possibility for flash flooding remains high as an active trough linger near the Samoan islands through Tuesday morning. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 6 Afiafi Aso Gafua Ianuari 16 2023 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO LUA... MAFUAAGA...O tafega ma lologa e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono faatupulaia. NOFOAGA...Aafia uma ai motu o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le taeao o le Aso Lua. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai aualatele ma nofoaga maualalo. E mafai ona osofia tafega o vaitafe. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga loulou o le tau o le a faatupulaia ai pea timuga mamafa ma faititili i luga o le atunu`u se`ia oo i le aoauli nei. E faaitiitia le malosi o uiga louloua o le tau i le po nanei, ma o le a faapea fo`i ona aga`i atu le tele o timuga mamafa i saute ma saute i sasa`e o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
